_sText:
A JB map intended to be functional and clean throughout the entire process.
==================

**Things to do**
- Pool
- Surf
- Soccer (system to differentiate teams)
- Number Wall
- Simon Says
- Jumprope
- Couch game
- Totempole
- Simon Says
- Breakfall
- Bhop
- Knife arena
- Shot 4 Shot
- Deagle Toss
- Tic Tac Toe
- Disco

**Features**
- 2 Hidden Deagles
- 2 Smoke grenades with a B1 emoticon
- A hidden Smoke grenade with a trail
- Secret armory feature that turns out the power for 12 seconds
- 2 hidden vents

(Please add me on steam @ http://steamcommunity.com/id/oi_m8 for any special requests)

jb_b1_detention_center_fix release
==================
- Fixed couch game exploit (button never shut off after being hit, multiple - games started at once)
- Fixed all spammable buttons, people loved to see the server messages fly!
- Fixed some parts of surf and increased flow
- Fixed diving boards
- Changed some glass textures since people had a hard time seeing it
- Changed the way jumprope works (when you exit it, it stops)
- Changed lighting in pool, soccer, isolations, and medics
- Changed soccer ball physics
- Changed time power goes out for
- Changed breakfloor color (instead of grey they turn blue for you blind folks)
- Removed deagle in top left cell
- Added vent going from soccer to armory
- Added usp to top left cell
